form.label: UI TOP, AIX Processes System Resources statistics
form.description: User Interface for the TOP monitor on AIX Systems

search.query: | tstats count AS Count from datamodel=NMON_Data_TOP where (nodename = TOP_AIX) ($osfilter$) groupby "TOP_AIX.frameID" prestats=true | stats dedup_splitvals=t count AS Count by "TOP_AIX.frameID" | sort limit=0 "TOP_AIX.frameID" | fields - _span | fillnull Count | fields "TOP_AIX.frameID"

| tstats count AS Count from datamodel=NMON_Data_TOP where (nodename = TOP_AIX) (TOP_AIX.hostname=$hostname-prefilter$) ($osfilter$) ($frameID$) groupby "TOP_AIX.hostname" prestats=true | stats dedup_splitvals=t count AS Count by "TOP_AIX.hostname" | sort limit=0 "TOP_AIX.hostname" | fields - _span | fillnull Count | fields "TOP_AIX.hostname"

input.label: Increase factor CPU load by SMT mode:

choice.value: eval smt_threads=(logical_cpus/virtual_cpus) | eval pct_CPU=case(isnotnull(smt_threads) AND smt_threads>="2", pct_CPU*1.2, isnotnull(smt_threads) AND smt_threads>="4", pct_CPU*1.4, isnull(smt_threads), pct_CPU)

input.choice: x 1.2 for SMT2, x 1.4 for SMT4
input.default: eval smt_threads=(logical_cpus/virtual_cpus) | eval pct_CPU=case(isnotnull(smt_threads) AND smt_threads>="2", pct_CPU*1.2, isnotnull(smt_threads) AND smt_threads>="4", pct_CPU*1.4, isnull(smt_threads), pct_CPU)

choice.value: stats dedup_splitvals=t sum(value) AS value by _time,Command | eval hostname="aggreg"
stats dedup_splitvals=t avg(value) AS value by _time,Command | eval hostname="aggreg"

div.h4: Open the Howto build Nmon statistics for TOP / If UARG collection is activated, search for PIDs, Commands and Full Arguments of processes: Open UARG Search Interface in new window

input.label: Filter values: (ex: value>1 will filter values consumming 1 core min)

search.query: | tstats max("TOP_AIX.pct_CPU") AS pct_CPU from datamodel=NMON_Data_TOP where (nodename = TOP_AIX) (TOP_AIX.hostname=$hostname-prefilter$) ($osfilter$) ($frameID$) ($hostname$) ($Command$) ($PID$) `$timefilter$(TOP_AIX)` groupby _time, "TOP_AIX.hostname", "TOP_AIX.logical_cpus", "TOP_AIX.Command", "TOP_AIX.PID" prestats=true span=1m | stats dedup_splitvals=t max("TOP_AIX.pct_CPU") AS pct_CPU by _time, "TOP_AIX.hostname", "TOP_AIX.logical_cpus", "TOP_AIX.Command", "TOP_AIX.PID" | rename "TOP_AIX.hostname" AS hostname "TOP_AIX.logical_cpus" AS logical_cpus "TOP_AIX.Command" AS Command "TOP_AIX.PID" AS PID | eval limit=(logical_cpus*100) | where (pct_CPU<=limit) | $majorsmt$ | stats sum(pct_CPU) As pct_CPU,last(logical_cpus) As logical_cpus by _time,hostname,Command | eval usage_per_core=(pct_CPU/100) | stats sum(usage_per_core) As value by _time,hostname,Command | $aggregate$ | bucket _time $span$ | stats $statsmode$(value) As value by _time,hostname,Command | search $valuefilter$ | eval s1="value" | makemv s1 | mvexpand s1 | eval yval=case(s1=="value",value) | eval series=hostname+":"+Command | xyseries _time,series,yval | makecontinuous _time $span$ | rename "aggreg:*" AS "*"

table.title: Table stats: CPU Usage per logical core

search.query: | tstats max("TOP_AIX.pct_CPU") AS pct_CPU from datamodel=NMON_Data_TOP where (nodename = TOP_AIX) (TOP_AIX.hostname=$hostname-prefilter$) ($osfilter$) ($frameID$) ($hostname$) ($Command$) ($PID$) `$timefilter$(TOP_AIX)` groupby _time, "TOP_AIX.frameID", "TOP_AIX.hostname", "TOP_AIX.logical_cpus", "TOP_AIX.Command", "TOP_AIX.PID" prestats=true span=1m | stats dedup_splitvals=t max("TOP_AIX.pct_CPU") AS pct_CPU by _time, "TOP_AIX.frameID", "TOP_AIX.hostname", "TOP_AIX.logical_cpus", "TOP_AIX.Command", "TOP_AIX.PID" | rename "TOP_AIX.frameID" AS frameID, "TOP_AIX.hostname" AS hostname "TOP_AIX.logical_cpus" AS logical_cpus "TOP_AIX.Command" AS Command "TOP_AIX.PID" AS PID | eval limit=(logical_cpus*100) | where (pct_CPU<=limit) | $majorsmt$ | stats sum(pct_CPU) As pct_CPU,last(logical_cpus) As logical_cpus by _time,frameID,hostname,Command | eval usage_per_core=(pct_CPU/100) | stats sum(usage_per_core) As value by _time,frameID,hostname,Command | $aggregate$ | eval frameID=if(isnull(frameID), "aggreg", frameID) | stats $statsmode$(value) as usage_per_core, sparkline($statsmode$(value)) As sparkline by frameID,hostname,Command | rename usage_per_core As "CPU Usage per Logical Cores" | sort - "CPU Usage per Logical Cores"

table.title: Table stats: Memory Usage per command invocation

search.query: | tstats max("TOP_AIX.ResText") AS ResText max("TOP_AIX.ResData") AS ResData from datamodel=NMON_Data_TOP where (nodename = TOP_AIX) (TOP_AIX.hostname=$hostname-prefilter$) ($osfilter$) ($frameID$) ($hostname$) ($Command$) ($PID$) `$timefilter$(TOP_AIX)` groupby _time, "TOP_AIX.frameID", "TOP_AIX.hostname", "TOP_AIX.logical_cpus", "TOP_AIX.Command", "TOP_AIX.PID" prestats=true span=1m | stats dedup_splitvals=t max("TOP_AIX.ResText") AS ResText max("TOP_AIX.ResData") AS ResData by _time, "TOP_AIX.frameID", "TOP_AIX.hostname", "TOP_AIX.logical_cpus", "TOP_AIX.Command", "TOP_AIX.PID" | rename "TOP_AIX.frameID" AS frameID, "TOP_AIX.hostname" AS hostname "TOP_AIX.logical_cpus" AS logical_cpus "TOP_AIX.Command" AS Command "TOP_AIX.PID" AS PID | eval Used_Mem_MB=((ResData+ResText)/1024) | stats sum(Used_Mem_MB) As value by _time,frameID,hostname,Command | $aggregate$ | eval frameID=if(isnull(frameID), "aggreg", frameID) | stats $statsmode$(value) as Used_Mem_MB, sparkline($statsmode$(value)) as sparkline by frameID,hostname,Command | eval Used_Mem_MB=round(Used_Mem_MB,2) | rename Used_Mem_MB As "Used Memory per Command (MB)" | sort - "Used Memory per Command (MB)",hostname
